The goal is to draw an irregular parallelogram based on the 3 random user points.

As soon as the user puts the third point will trigger the drawings.

The program will calculate the forth point, the center of mass and the area.

After that, the app will draw the parallelogram, the circle using the center of mass and show the area calculated.

After the drawing is completed, the user can move the selected point by click and move and everything will be recalculated.

To reset the screen just click on the RESET button.
